thread.title: #LessonLearned: Snowden Snowed Under by 1M Twitter Email Notifications
thread.title_full: #LessonLearned: Snowden Snowed Under by 1M Twitter Email Notifications - NBC News

author: nbcnews.com
title: #LessonLearned: Snowden Snowed Under by 1M Twitter Email Notifications
text:
When a reclusive, highly polarizing international figure of cyber-mystery joins Twitter, you can bet he's going to get a lot of followers. But you'd think that person would know to turn off email notifications — something Edward Snowden said he failed to do, much to his chagrin.
I forgot to turn off notifications. Twitter sent me an email for each: Follow Favorite Retweet DM 47 gigs of notifications. #lessonlearned
— Edward Snowden (@Snowden) October 1, 2015 The former NSA contractor joined Twitter on Tuesday and racked up more than 1 million followers in 24 hours.
Related: Edward Snowden Joins Twitter: 'Can You Hear Me Now? '
advertisement When contacted Thursday for confirmation of Snowden's email avalanche, Twitter told NBC News that it does not comment on individual accounts. And the service already sends out millions of emails every day for others who want notifications of retweets and new followers, so what's a million more?
